buildup.text: Warm water holds less dissolved oxygen than cold water. As oceans heat, oxygen levels drop.

discovery.text: Stronger stratification prevents oxygen-rich surface water from mixing into the deep.

twist.text: The ocean has lost about 2% of its oxygen since the 1960s. Some regions have lost far more.
